articles.author: Tom Dart
articles.title: UConn survive suspect squid, a hotel switch and theft to claim NCAA title - The Guardian
articles.description: One of the few sure things in an unpredictable March Madness was the Huskies’ ability to rise above the chaos around them
articles.content: Nothing not dirty hotel rooms, dodgy calamari, a bus burglary or one of college basketballs most vaunted defenses was going to deny Connecticut. And so a March Madness tournament that started with ta… [+6528 chars]
